title: Challenging Collaboration: Team Conflict Emerges
content: While working on a cross-functional product launch, a team member and I disagreed on prioritizing features. The tension affected our ability to collaborate effectively and delayed key decisions.

title: Underlying Friction: Misaligned Priorities
content: The conflict stemmed from differing departmental goalsâ€”marketing pushed for a flashy feature, while I advocated for user-tested functionality. This misalignment created persistent friction during meetings.

title: Taking Initiative: Constructive Engagement
content: I scheduled a one-on-one conversation to understand their perspective and share mine openly. We agreed to map each feature against user impact and marketing value to align on priorities objectively.

title: Resolution Achieved: Collaborative Reprioritization
content: By shifting to data-driven discussions, we reached consensus on the launch scope. Our renewed collaboration accelerated the timeline and fostered stronger cross-team trust.

title: Reflection: Growth Through Conflict
content: The experience taught me the value of empathy and proactive dialogue in resolving professional disagreements. It reinforced my belief that conflict, when handled constructively, can lead to stronger outcomes.
